content:
#  New Build Available
üîî You can subscribe to the role <@&953393961148493834> in <#1216592327821492264>.

üÜï Please only play Silicon with a fresh save on the latest build unless told otherwise. This makes sure you're not dealing old bugs or issues!

embeds.title: Trainer Tip: Automatic Win and Lose
embeds.description:
While looking at the "Fight / Bag / Pok√©mon / Run" menu...

* Press <:dpad_up:1063558392498622594> and <:button_b:1063558341248430161> and then select a Move to automatically **WIN** a battle.
* Press <:dpad_down:1063558352736633033> and <:button_b:1063558341248430161> and then select a Move to automatically **LOSE** a battle.

The game is designed so that the player loses their first battle against Tala and Alcmene.

embeds.title: Trainer Tip: Fresh Save
embeds.description: To start a fresh save, press <:button_r:1063558345564377109> and <:button_select:1209505839455666197> from the Title Screen, and select a cutscene from the list.

embeds.title: Trainer Tip: Story Jump
embeds.description:
To go forward to a specific point in the story, go to the overworld and press <:button_r:1063558345564377109> and <:button_start:1063558349926453378>. Select Story Jump, and then you can select an Act and Cutscene. You will be warped to directly AFTER this cutscene. 

‚ö†Ô∏è Attempting to go backwards will render the game unplayable.
